radiographic_examinations.findings: Small bilateral pleural effusions with associated compressive lower lobe atelectasis; segment 3 hypointense T1 nonenhancing lesion likely representing a cyst biliary hamartoma; gallbladder markedly distended with multiple small gallstones, wall thickening, mural edema, and pericholecystic stranding; pancreas shows multiple 3 mm cystic lesions likely representing side-branch IPMNs; colonic diverticulosis without diverticulitis; small hiatal hernia.
